attributes.action: Protect our children - remove Migrant hotels from towns and cities!
attributes.additional_details: Create asylum seekers centres away from schools families etc. Stop using the tax payers money to house potentially dangerous individuals.
attributes.background: Hundreds of asylum seekers are being boarded in hotels near schools and families. We don't know these people there background and yet they are protected but we aren't.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You mention towns and cities in the petition title, but then talk more generally about schools and families in the body of your petition.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
